|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = 2 |fla1chip = Micron;; |flash1size = 2 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1111; |sw_cpu = true |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 1C:AA:07 |oui = 1C:AA:07

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT5372; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *OEM: [[Foxconn]] U58O201 (U58O201T04)
:1x Gigabit Ethernet uplink, 4x Fast-Ethernet switch speeds :The entry also appears to apply to the HS-E300-AP-K9..
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/switches/edge-300-series/data_sheet_c78-694183.html Datasheet]
==See also== *[[Cisco Edge 340 DMP (CS-E340W)]] (-M32-A-K9) - ''Digital Media Player'' • [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/video/edge-340-digital-media-player/datasheet-c78-732178.html DS] :● CPU: @1.60GHz (Dual-core) :● Memory: 2GB (DDR3 memory) :● Storage: 32GB (built-in SSD), one SD slot :(multi-level cell [MLC] SD card highly preferred)
